input.sentences: while the other played another instrument .
output.sentences: Simon warmed up the crowd at the club tonight with his soulful playing.
Lester and that instrument of his rocked the house, while AJ played an awesome electric guitar.
Dan and Roger hit the stage next, playing their funky style with the band.
Max, a talented guitarist, sang his captive audience the blues.
The drums brought down the house for the finale, the audience cheering as Jay and Rico played.
